ygData.subject: Re: Question about Tarton's Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Given where that rod is all that you need is invis...and just hope you don t come across an SK guard that has it s pet summoned... Also, there is a set of
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 23 Sep 1999, Shadowwalker wrote:
> Sorry if this is a stupid question. If the one rod is located in
> Neriak, does this mean that the only way to get it is with the mask of
> the deceiver (being a high elf)?

Given where that rod is all that you need is invis...and just hope you
don't come across an SK guard that has it's pet summoned...

Also, there is a set of tunnels form the Ogre Section of the Forgen
Quarter that leads deeper into the city, though those may not be of any
use for this, it's been a while since i was in them and i'm a little fuzzy
on where they come out at...

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
